name: ViroCare™ Plus Cleaner & Degreaser
description: ViroCare™ Plus Cleaner & Degreaser is a powerful deep cleaner and deodorizer similar in properties to well-known national brands. ViroCare™ PLUS deep cleans a multitude of surfaces, eliminating dirt-causing bacteria. Chlorine, quaternary, and phosphate-free. ViroCare™ PLUS provides effective deep cleaning, while deodorizing areas where deep cleaning is critical to controlling the hazards of cross-contamination on high touch surfaces. ViroCare™ PLUS eliminates unwanted odors, removes soils, stains, and soap scum and helps in the restoration of water damage, or the effects of water intrusion.
